title: Black Crown
description: Weakened, but not broken, Mae must face her destiny in this thrilling conclusion to the White Hart trilogy.  Heroic Mae Waylander travels across the desert in search of a way to defeat the tyrannical king and stop him finding immortality.  With dangerous beasts and a war in her way, can Mae achieve her goal and set the kingdom of Aegunlund free?
author: Sarah Dalton
